with matrices, we need to know the properties of these operations.

Many properties of the matrix operations are analogous to properties of addition and multiplication of numbers. For example, the rules for addition are exactly as the rules for adding numbers. However, multiplication of matrices must be treated with care, as there are differences between the multiplication of numbers and multiplication of matrices. We emphasize two exceptions.
